evidence.claim: Summer Health leverages AWS services for cloud infrastructure, specifically using AWS Lambda and S3 for data processing and storage.
The company has stated its commitment to HIPAA compliance in its security documentation.
Integration with health data systems is done via HL7 FHIR standards, facilitating interoperability.
Utilization of Google Cloud Platform for data management solutions is mentioned in their engineering careers page.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12-related transactions or requirements on the site.
